short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Project your G.P.A on your past and next modules to see how many G.P.A you could have obtained (if you hadn't choke your module)!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- On your Epitech intranet, go to "Profile" > "Notes".

- A new column will appear where you can choose your G.P.A on past or future modules.

- In the G.P.A section, a new G.P.A in green will be the G.P.A simulated with your changes!
